short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emphasizes the vibrant autumn colors of the aspen trees.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A solitary cabin, painted a serene blue, stands as a tranquil oasis amidst a sea of golden aspens. The vibrant fall foliage creates a striking contrast against the clear blue sky, inviting viewers to immerse themselves in the peaceful ambiance of the mountain retreat.
